column5: Does anyone know a good place to get parts for a motor guide trolling motor.  I have an older stealth bowmount and the gear to control the direction indication is busted.  Thanks! Evan
http://www.icefishinggeorgianbay.com/ is an authorized sales and service depot, not sure if Aikmans is. Might try either one depending on where you live, good luck.
Yep, Backwater in midland.  Bryan Berriault (sp)
Bryan,s a good guy,Im sure he will help you out pronto.
Thanks guys!  I'll get in touch with him.
Aeikmans sporting deals with motorguide.  Aikman A Sporting Goods Repair 3010 Novar Road, Mississauga, ON L5B 1S4 Telephone : 905-277-3595
